Text: Grrarrrr!
Eat thiiis!
Aaaaghh!
Wh-Who...the hell...a-are you...?!

My attacks...are on point today! I only missed the
first one!
Whoa! Have I improved?!

Now that the distractions are gone, let's get down to
business.
Grrrr...!
...Bite that woman's throat!
Graahhh!
Ack! It's well-trained!

You heartless wolf! We were fighting shoulder to
shoulder just a moment ago!
Grarrr!
Tsk!
...What?! Why?!
None of my attacks are landing!
...Who the hell is this Luna woman?

It seems you've got the fighting chops, but your
fighting instincts are nonexistent.
Not that you can't see idiotic swordplay elsewhere,

but this woman takes the cake. I'd say she's the
natural embodiment of no control!
Hey! I can hear you!

As your assailant, I'm not sure I should be the one
to say this, but why not try and aim a little more
carefully?

Your aim is way off the mark, even considering the
wolf's speed.
I can see that for myself, thank you very much!
I can't land what I can't land!
Gimme a break... Hyaaah!

...You can't even hit a non-moving target. Don't you
think that's pretty serious...?

Stay out of this! It doesn't involve you! Next time
I'll hit it for sure!
Uh, how am I not involvedâ€”?
A-Ack?!
Huh?!
Agh...ghh...!
Oops... I hit him...!
What am I saying?! It's not like that's a bad thing!
...I-I see it now...!

She distracted me with her clever banter and acting!
This woman...is dangerous...!

E-Exactly! All my missed attacks from earlier were
just to throw you off!
Well? Not so tough now, are you!

Why am I making excuses to a dead guy? I just sound
overly defensive...
Grrrr...
Hey, you know how I can improve my sword skills?

I think I can make progress in business, but as you
can see, my fighting is a whole other story.
...Grrgh.

Not even a glance in my direction... You really are
well-trained!

...We've found a small lead concerning the attack on
you the other day. We believe they were assassins
hired by another company.

You mean they weren't assassins from the Cult of
Diablos?

No. A small number of companies have tamed alpha
wolves as a means of protection.

That makes it somewhat challenging to narrow down the
attackers based on our current lead.

Other companies are clearly growing hostile to
Luna, Ltd. and its tremendous growth.

...But, in a sense, this proves that our company's
influence has grown to the point where the other
companies can no longer ignore it.

I think it's safe to assume this also means our
business is taking off.

Therefore, I'd also like to take action against the
companies attempting to interfere with our new
business here in the capital.

Feel free to request help from the other Seven
Shadows, including me. Be cautious but be bold,
Gamma.
Leave it to me, Lady Alpha!
All for the glory of our lord and the Shadow Garden!

My lord! Please tell me how I can make my attacks
land properly!

I tried unleashing my magic at full force like you
previously taught me, but I can't seem to land any
blows!
Hmm...

(If teaching could help you, you'd have mastered the
ability to control your magic long ago, Gamma...!)

My lord, you once told me that the weakest should
fight in the best way for them!

"Those who know themselves to be the weakest are wise
enough to find the path to becoming the strongest!"

With these words in mind, I have held my own when it
comes to the Garden's operational aspects.

(Ohhh... I did say something like that. What I meant
was that it's best to know when to give up...)

(But it would sound unnecessarily harsh if I told her
that directly... She's smart, so I'm sure there's a way
I can word it better to get the point across.)

I want to be first-rate in both combat and business
politics!
Ah!

...Don't you think that's being too greedy, Gamma?
You know what they say, between two stools, you
fall to the ground.

That's not true! Lady Alpha and Zeta excel at
everythingâ€”whether it's between three or
even four stools!

Ah...but you're talking about a tiny sample of
exceptional cases as if they were the norm.

Alpha and Zeta are like maxed-out, overpowered
characters. If anything, they're extreme exceptions
to the rule that shouldn't even really be allowed.
But...!
Still, I...!

Well, no matter what you do, just be sure to build
the groundwork in case you trip and fall.

Everything else is pointless if you can't maintain
your balance where you stand.
Where I stand...?!

...Ahh! You're absolutely right, my lord! Right now
is the time to strengthen my current position!

It's not too late to overcome my weakness in combat
afterward... I almost misplaced my priorities!
Oh, err...

(I meant to say she would work on her groundwork
because she tends to slip and fall even when she just
stands there holding her sword.)

(But... Oh, well. Anyway, Gamma seems pretty
satisfied.)

...That's right. Don't slip andâ€”uh, fall behind on
your priorities, Gamma.
Understood, my lord!
